iTunes 9.0.2 update available, supports Apple TV 3.0
iPhoto 8.1.1 update available (12.5MB), addresses issue with facial recognition
Logic Pro 9.1 update available, adds 64-bit compatibility
iPad introduced, 9.7" multi-touch tablet. Included iBooks Store and iWork. 16GB Wifi only US$499, shipping March.
Aperture 3 announced and available, includes Brushes, Faces and Places
